record.creatorPhotographer: Capes Photo; Kaufmann and Fabry Company
record.description: Burton-Judson Courts taken from the northwest corner. Completed in 1931. Cost at completion $1,756,287. [Estimated] replacement cost, January 1956, $4,650,000.00.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Capes negative on file.One copy is missing most of the upper left corner. Another copy has black crayon marks for cropping and white paint tracing the inner image of the Burton-Judson Courts. Stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Office of Press Relations; Stamp: Please return to University of Chicago Public Relations Office.
